january.title: Human Fraternity
january.message: May the Lord give us the grace to live in full fellowship with our brothers and sisters of other religions, praying for one another, open to all.

february.title: Violence Against Women
february.message: We pray for women who are victims of violence, that they may be protected by society and have their sufferings considered and heeded.

march.title: Sacrament of Reconciliation
march.message: Let us pray that we may experience the sacrament of reconciliation with renewed depth, to taste the infinite mercy of God.

april.title: Fundamental Rights
april.message: We pray for those who risk their lives while fighting for fundamental rights under dictatorships, authoritarian regimes and even in democracies in crisis.

may.title: The World of Finance
may.message: Let us pray that those in charge of finance will work with governments to regulate the financial sphere and protect citizens from its dangers.

june.title: The Beauty of Marriage
june.message: Let us pray for young people who are preparing for marriage with the support of a Christian community: may they grow in love, with generosity, faithfulness and patience

july.title: Social Friendship
july.message: We pray that, in social, economic and political situations of conflict, we may be courageous and passionate architects of dialogue and friendship.

august.title: The Church
august.message: Let us pray for the Church, that she may receive from the Holy Spirit the grace and strength to reform herself in the light of the Gospel.

september.title: An Environmentally Sustainable Lifestyle
september.message: We pray that we all will make courageous choices for a simple and environmentally sustainable lifestyle, rejoicing in our young people who are resolutely committed to this.

october.title: Missionary Disciples
october.message: We pray that every baptized person may be engaged in evangelization, available to the mission, by being witnesses of a life that has the flavor of the Gospel.

november.title: People Who Suffer from Depression
november.message: We pray that people who suffer from depression or burn-out will find support and a light that opens them up to life.

december.title: Catechists
december.message: Let us pray for the catechists, summoned to announce the Word of God: may they be its witnesses, with courage and creativity and in the power of the Holy Spirit
